website_summaries.verdict: Pour over coffee maker perfect for a couple. This glass vessel will produce 3 cups of coffee.
pros: Makes good-tasting coffee for a reasonable price
No need to use your own filters since it's outfitted with a reusable one of its own
cons: Very fragile glass construction that loses heat rapidly
Small size isn't suitable for serving larger groups

customer_reviews.title: Best cup of coffee at home
customer_reviews.text: We have only had for a couple weeks but seems like it’s well built. Definitely easy to use and takes less than 5 min to have probably the best cup of coffee you have had in a very long time. Kudos to the team as we love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Man

customer_reviews.title: Shattered dreams (and carafes.)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I didn't want a coffee maker that required filters to be be replaced and I'm the only one in the house that drinks coffee. When really, I should had read the reviews before buying. After one wash (and one brew) the carafe broke. It was difficult already to wash and it slipped from my hands. Completely shattered. I called the company if I could have it replaced and to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my carafe.
customer_reviews.text: Small pot brewing has changed my world. I use a scale to measure my beans and this pour over brewer with carafe several times a day. I love that I can get a consistently great cup of coffee. It takes a little more of your attention than pressing a button on your clunky coffee machine but it's worth it. The main reason for this purchase was to reduce my dependance on coffee filters. It's nice that I'm not creating extra waste but the real benefit to me is that I'm not in danger of running out of filters. Nothing's worse than waking up in the mood for a perfect cup only to find you're all out of filters.
customer_reviews.author: Eat Up! Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: A great way to make a cup of coffee - Gator or Aeropress today?
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee. It is a good day when I to make the though decision between an Aeropress or a Gator. This pour over method is a great way to enjoy quality coffee. If you have a good grinder and you do a medium grind you won'd be disappointed with the result. The stainless steel filter does a great job of keeping grounds out of the brew, while letting some fine material and oils through. The oils and fine particulates add a very nice body to the coffee. It is super easy to clean. My only complaint is that the vessel seems fragile.This is a great addition to my Aeropress.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P ATX

customer_reviews.title: Substandard materials, defective manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The jug shattered when I dropped it in the sink. The filter fell apart. Very poor quality materials and manufacture. Manufacturer has not responded to my calls or emails. The customer service number goes straight to voicemail.
customer_reviews.author: Andy65

customer_reviews.title: Takes time, worth it though
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate enough to someone who has used one before and taught me pour a little water over grounds let set for about 20 to 30 seconds then do your first full pour of water. I use hazelnut coffee too (Seattle Best) and it smells and tastes even better. U barely use any cream or sugar, easy to control how strong you like it. You do have to have patience with it, it takes a food amount of time to make 4 cups of coffe definitely if you like it strong. So worth it though!!! I was sick of the office coffee and this is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Service, fragile product, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: glass breaks if you look at it wrong. Broke second time I used it. Great customer service as they replaced it right away. 2nd one has now broken even as I was try to be super careful with it. Glass needs to be thicker. They know this. if they ever make a version 2 that isn't so fragile, I'm in.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A.

customer_reviews.title: A favorite at our house
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this pour over coffee pot. It gets used almost every day! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Becky Dirks

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I disregarded the reviews that said that this coffee maker was easily broken. However it arrived broken in the package. I returned the unit and purchased a different system. I would not recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this rig!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the world of pour over coffee but, this carafe/filter rocks! If you get the water temp and proportions correct it will produce a fantastic cup. The process itself adds a extra layer of enjoyment. Definitely by a nice gooseneck kettle, digital scale and thermometer. Follow the included instructions for proportions and watch a few YouTube videos on proper technique. Once you get the "bloom" down, you'll find it hard to drink conventionally percolated coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Muad'Dib

customer_reviews.title: Cute but glass is too thin
customer_reviews.text: One star for form - it’s a nice design. The paperless filter is great. However I have purchased two - the first one was tapped on the inside of the sink while washing and shattered. I decided to try again, and a few weeks later the second one cracked and spider-webbed when I accidentally (lightly) tapped it against the coffee mug while pouring. If they’d make this with stronger tempered glass, I’d give it 5 stars. But I won’t be purchasing a third. I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good brew
customer_reviews.text: Compact and simplicity are its charms. Who needs to plug in when you just want a cup or two?
customer_reviews.author: JRaznick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Easy to use. Makes a good brew!
customer_reviews.author: Kags

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the first use. The glass is VERY thin. Very, very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Palmour

customer_reviews.title: Bad Flow
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for the first few weeks and then it clogged up and takes much longer for the coffee to run out the bottom. Nothing seems to unclog the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Weiss

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with "pour over" coffee. I really like the Coffee Gator brewer. The capacity is perfect, and I like the fact that no paper filters are needed. The coffee brews quickly and the cleanup of the carafe and filter is simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: Makes strong coffee without bitterness
customer_reviews.text: Makes excellent coffee! Filter is easy to clean and seems durable. I’ve been preheating it with hot water like some other reviews recommend, but don’t know that it’s necessary. I’m happy with my purchase, in fact I bought more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Inman

customer_reviews.title: Worth EVERY penny.!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing 👌🏾😭 wasn’t too sure about the metal filter but it’s made of exceptional material that DOES NOT leave a metal like taste. The coffee it made tasted SO GOOD. Nothing I would change about the product to be quite honest. And the support is absolutely impeccable. Some of the nicest people, seriously.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pourover....
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for about a week and love the simplicity of the product, especially the mesh filter....it saves paper filters and does a great job at filtering. The glass carafe seems thin but so far has held up just fine. Thanks for a great product at a reasonable price...my only regret is that I didn't order the teapot with the pourover...maybe later.
customer_reviews.author: Riehl F.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious coffee, no more papers!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I only wish the filter was deeper or larger. My wife and I drink STRONG coffee. So for only our 2 cups in the morning, the filter is maxed out and hard to not overflow unless you really go slow. But this didn’t merit a loss of star to be honest. I’m an engineer, super easy fixes come to mind. And the coffee is just so delicious. I was skeptical about a metal filter, but it really has preserved more of the oils. I’m sold! If I don’t make a fix to my filter soon, maybe release a bigger one :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. Stainless steel so no filters, measurements on the side so you know exactly how much to pour, handle for pouring. Delicious product. Signed a fussy java gal
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McGoldrick

customer_reviews.title: Healthier and Better tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: Glass and steel. No trace of harmful plastic. Love my coffee gator. Better and healthier coffee than keurig K-cups. I grind my starbucks coffee beans add to the coffee gator and let hot water pour. Simple process and delicious. I put the coffee gator in dish washer and I am done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonite

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy glass
customer_reviews.text: Super flimsy glass... you need to care for this as if it’s your baby and make sure your pick it up and put it down lightly. it cracked after pouring hot water in it. The top filter is nice tho, I use that now to just pour into a normal glass..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive entry into the pour over method
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with this brewer. It's simple, inexpensive and has a small footprint. The only negative so far is, as others have mentioned, the glass carafe is thin and feels delicate. Only time will tell if it stands up to the daily grind (pun). Bonus: you can submit your order # and email address to get a one-year warranty PLUS the privilege of reading Phil the owner's marketing emails with clickbaity subjects like, "Splat! How come no one else found it as disgusting as me?" and "The wet and wild morning that changed my life." Forgive me, I haven't had my coffee yet.
customer_reviews.author: CJN

customer_reviews.title: Very unfortunate because I liked the Coffee Gator Pour Over while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Glass is very thin and broke within a month. Very unfortunate because I liked the Coffee Gator Pour Over while it lasted, but other glass coffee equipment I've owned has lasted longer. EDIT: In response to my review, Coffee Gator offered to send me a replacement. I received it after some issues with the Amazon messaging system. The company has very good customer service, and you do not lose anything by trying out their pour over. However, be warned that the glass is extremely fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good cup
customer_reviews.text: Glass seems to be quite thin. But no problem yet. I wouldn't keep it on the counter with rugrats around or animals that like to get on the counter when everyone gone.
customer_reviews.author: yowmon

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL and difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: VERY SMALL and difficult to use. Carafe is only 6 inches high. Filter holds less than a cup or water so you have to hold kettle over it as it filters through or do in several pours. Carafe, filled over the max, only holds about 2 1/2, eight ounce cups not three. Filter is difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great product and nice company
customer_reviews.text: When the Coffee Gator arrived, we thought it was attractive, but we had a problem with it. An insert encouraged buyers to to communicate with the company in case of a problem. Without that encouragement, I might have let the problem go. When I wrote to the company, they could not have been more courteous and responsive. Now, it works perfectly. We did not have to wait. The coffee Gator pours beautifully, cleans easily and makes good coffee.
customer_reviews.author: sonia fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coffee! An easy and fun way to brew. Blind me with science, Gator...
customer_reviews.text: After trying a couple variants of the Keurig-type brewers on the market, we went right back to basics. Our intention with the powered brewers was to use the K-Cup-type reusable filters because there was no way in hell that we were going to buy those little coffee pods to add to an already garbage-laden planet. I realize we're not saving the earth with this choice but no need to join in on this particularly gross and unnecessary human-piggy behavior. With the Gator, yes, it takes a little time to get that perfect cup of coffee but it's minutes well spent. Plus, the ends justify the means. Perfect. Get one for yourself. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to, but the filter can be annoying
customer_reviews.text: The filter provided is helpful to save more paper, and it does great at that...but the issue i have as someone who grinds beans to different sizes every other day or so, quite often small pieces of the grinds end up getting stuck between the metal and the mesh area (some of which are really difficult to get out). This is a small thing to be concerned about, but it does add a few extra minutes to my routine so that i can 100% know that it's completely cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Lasted TWO weeks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Coffee Gator on 14 July 2020. I had read the reviews and was aware how fragile this carafe is. I have been very conscientious about keeping a good grip on it when washing. But, this morning I woke up to find a hole in it. Honestly, I have no idea what dinged it to cause it to break. The two weeks that I did get to use it I really liked the 4 cup size, my coffee tasted great, and was really easy to prepare with the included metal filter. My advice would be to NEVER, EVER wash the carafe or keep it near any other item that my inadvertently break it.
customer_reviews.author: KLP

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee with minor design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Makes very good coffee. Compared to Aeropress, it's about a toss up - both quite good. I like them both (much better Keurig [Yuck!] or French press). Only 4 stars because the cone is way too small for "3 cups" (or one travel mug!) You need to pour multiple times. I'd rather pour once and keep my coffee hotter (though it really doesn't lose that much heat with 3 pours. Even with the Aeropress I need two pours for a travel mug. However, the coffee is very good and less mess and parts to clean than the Aeropress. So, I ordered the larger model and I'll leave this at the office for a "freshen up".
customer_reviews.author: Vic Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cup of joe
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this poor over coffee maker 🖤☕ I have a Keurig and I hate using those pods and I've tried multiple brands reusable pods but then I get a ton of coffee grinds in my cup of morning goodness. So I did some research and decided to get a pour over style coffee maker that is both environmentally friendly and makes a great cup of coffee. If your on the fence get this you wont be disappointed. Easy to clean, easy to use and makes great coffee
customer_reviews.author: Micki Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Gater > Keurig.
customer_reviews.text: This little coffee maker is legit. And the metal filter saves me on getting paper filters like I do with my other pour over coffee maker. It's a smaller pour over coffee maker and is great for work. I even used it camping last week and got quality coffee out of it. I utilize roughly 4 oz water to 1 level tablespoon scoop and it turns out great. Big Bonus is this coffee maker saves on me creating more debris. I stopped using keurigs cause its too much plastic waste. No waste making coffee this way.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: This did make excellent coffee, but after a little under two months, it cracked while I was washing it by hand. I used warm water and had not just used it, so there was not a sudden change in temperature. I always wash this by hand, although I usually just give it a quick rinse. I was using a little brush to wash it, since the neck is small. The glass is surprising thin I guess. I was being gentle. So so so sad! Customer service was on it and fixed everything. Have no fear! Changed to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GVegasYeah

customer_reviews.title: Pour over Coffee must
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for pour over coffee. I recently started manually grinding coffee beans and using cloth filter for pour over. Its kind of messy and I was looking for an easier and faster way to do it. The stainless steel filter is just what I wanted. The glass jar is a plus! It's so easy to clean and use. It really made my life easier. So happy to be drinking brewed coffee from non plastic appliances. The glass seems a bit delicate, but other than that it's an amazing product. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: zen

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good results.
customer_reviews.text: First time using the pour over method. Works very well and I'm glad I found the Gator. I use three tablespoons of medium ground coffee and use a pitcher with a spout to pour boiling (microwaved) water over the grounds. I use a stronger blend of coffee so I do the pour over using the same grounds three times. Not too weak, not too strong. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Urban Girl

customer_reviews.title: Hold onto this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pour over coffee maker! It’s so easy to use and clean! Well I mean it’s easy to clean for me, not my husband. The coffee maker requires a set of smaller, delicate hands. Which is probably the only downfall to this coffee maker. I hate doing the dishes and my husband complains he can’t wash it. Overall, this coffee maker is incredible! I’ve had this coffee maker for years and highly recommend it to anyone! My own sister stole my first one since she liked it so much. Get this coffee maker but hold onto it for dear life. People will fight you for it. I’m not even joking.
customer_reviews.author: Meta

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quick replacement of defective product
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months of use, my filter fell apart, the upper ring separating from the lower mesh part. Yikes! I emailed the company and they immediately sent a replacement, free of charge. So far, so good, with that one! I'm happy with great flavor of the coffee this equipment produces, and I love ditching those paper filters.
customer_reviews.author: CM Reader

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, simple, and makes great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I usually make one mug of coffee and this device is perfect. The stainless steel cone works very well and is easy to clean. I've seen comments about the glass being too thin, but didn't find that to be true. I used the recommended recipe, 20 grams of coffee and 11-12 ounces of water produces 8 ounces of coffee, just perfect for a mug. It also drips through quickly, so no waiting. Most of all, I can really tell the difference in flavor. A very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: John Murtari

customer_reviews.title: New Coffee Experience
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. You have to use caution since it's glass but it appears to be well constructed. Like the fact that the mesh filter requires no additional paper filter and the handle doesn't get hot to the touch. I'm still getting the hang of making coffee this way but so far I'm very pleased with this purchase. I've received several friendly e-mails from the Coffee Gator people and they are really making the effort to build good customer relations. I would definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Zazoo 3

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this almost 6 months ago and use it daily. I’m still obsessed with how simple this is. It’s so easy to clean too. I never use soap, just hot water. The glass broke the second day because it’s so thin but I didn’t need it. I just pour hot water right through the filter into my yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Very thin glass. Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Its really easy to use. The problem is the glass. It's waaaaay to fragile. I bought one, and accidentally broke it while cleaning it. I thought it was me just pressing to hard, so I bought another one... wife broke it this time also during the cleaning process. Flavor is great, though I don't drink coffee, the wife says is life changing. And the filter works great too. Too bad the glass is just too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Zamora

customer_reviews.title: VERY BREAKABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have another coffee gator that’s great and I love it. Bought this one as a gift for my roommate and it shattered on day 2. Fell off the drying rack onto the laminate countertop- only 2” drop. Shattered into a ton of pieces and we had to vacuum and clean everything in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as represented.
customer_reviews.text: I use this coffee Brewer every morning. It's easy to use and your first morning cup of coffee is special. I'm so glad I decided to try the Pour Over method of making coffee. You won't be sorry. It is glass so be careful when cleaning that you don't bump it into the sides of the sink. One by one your friends will buy this little Brewer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ann

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is a life-giving gift from heaven. This is a really good way to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Got VERY tired of the bad/weak coffee at work, so I bought this and some Caribou. Just finished my first cup and I am SO happy with it. It's faster than the Keurig that some people at my office use, and although it's slightly messier to deal with the grounds afterward, I'm not filling the landfill with tiny plastic cups for the next 2000 years. More importantly, I got a great cup of coffee! Seems pretty likely I'll be getting another one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff of the North

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Carafe but glass is somewhat thin
customer_reviews.text: This coffee carafe is extremely nifty and great to have around. I love coffee and as a single guy, I don't really need to brew a lot of coffee. I decided to grab this pour over carafe because of the reusable filter which saves on cost and the measurement on the side of the carafe to know how much more water to pour. The only concern I have with the carafe is the glass since it is relatively thin it needs to be handled with care (more so than regular dishes in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: kimcd9

customer_reviews.title: 1) Great concept and easy to use for one or two ...
customer_reviews.text: 1) Great concept and easy to use for one or two servings. Infinitely better than K-cups. 2) Absolutely awesome for coffee aficionados. Why the three stars? Because the glass beaker isn't tempered and quite weak. One bad hit, and something on this thing cracks. At worse, it might crack with the sudden change from hot to cold! That's no bueno for something whose purpose is to take in hot liquid! I've only used it twice. Edit: absolutely great customer service. the problem was addressed.
customer_reviews.author: IDB M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Coffee Gator!!! First of all it is adorable! Very sleek and elegant, it displays beautifully. But more important, I love that I no longer have to mess with filters! This permanent filter works perfectly and is simple to rinse out. I get a very even bloom, resulting in spectacular tasting coffee!!! I went from auto drip, to french press, to now pour over, and this is the richest, sweetest, creamy coffee I have ever made. Very glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Markert

customer_reviews.title: Love my Coffee Gator
customer_reviews.text: Love this drip pot. It's the perfect size and the filter is very durable and easy to clean. I actually pop it in the dishwasher and there is no lingering coffee smell. My coffee is perfect for me--never the parched or burned taste that can happen with traditional coffee makers. I would not be without my Coffee Gator!
customer_reviews.author: Pat S Grissett

customer_reviews.title: Nicer coffee maker, but not for long.
customer_reviews.text: This pour over option definitely is much better comparing to the old school coffee maker. In general, it works great. Couple of complaints: 1. Like most other people stated. The coffee pot is made of thin glass, and it will not last. My pot broke this morning with a simple tap on the countertop. 2. The metal coffee filter can be clogged after some use even I rinsed it every time after use. One way is to clean the filter with a toothbrush. I am in the market for a similar product but with durable glass.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Wu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This carafe is not “thin” in my opinion. I think the glass is plenty thick enough. The filter is very well made. I anticipate the product meeting my needs well. I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kay Peoples

customer_reviews.title: In love with my Gator
customer_reviews.text: If you’re willing to put in a bit of effort, this thing makes a great cup of coffee! I love using my gator for making my coffee on weekends, when I’m not as rushed in the morning. It’s not huge, but perfect for making coffee for just one or two people. I also love that it has a washable, reusable basket for the grounds, so you don’t have to keep buying the filters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pour over coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a pour over coffee maker for quite some time, and am very happy with my purchase of this one! The entire apparatus is easy to use and clean, and makes excellent coffee. I would recommend using french press style grounds (something between medium drip grind and slightly coarse) because the filter can become slightly clogged if the ground type is on the finer side.
customer_reviews.author: tenshichic

customer_reviews.title: It's a good, classy unit that works.
customer_reviews.text: I like this pour-over coffee maker a lot. It's a classy little unit that works like it should. The screening should be back flushed under the faucet after every use to keep it clean. If it gets clogged up a little, boil it briefly in a pan with clean clear water.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Peck

customer_reviews.title: Filter Tip Came Off
customer_reviews.text: The above item arrived on April 2, 2020 and I started using it on April 5th. Everything worked well until the cone tip of the end of the filter broke off from the main body on 4/19/20. In summary, this product only lasted for 2 weeks of daily usage and I'm so disappointed with the quality of this product. There was no rough handling of the product at all during the entire 2 weeks of use. I reached out to Coffee Gator and was told that replacement may take place end of April due to delay in supply shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Supe

customer_reviews.title: Fresh coffee
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a Keurig for a few years - had to replace it once and it is on its way out again - it is bulky. I do not use pods but have reusable filters. I ordered this pour over (and an electric kettle) and it is perfect - the smell of the freshly brewed coffee is phenomenal! It is very zen to pour over, stir, and watch it drip (I stir it with one of my chop sticks! lol). It is worry free, plastic and paper free, sustainable, and always works!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paige McCraney

customer_reviews.title: Cute while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleekness unfortunately it lasted a week 🤦🏻‍♀️. I wish they had a bigger size and the glass was stronger. I did not drop it or bang it and by the end of week it has a small crack in the bottom. The design has a great look.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: loved the filter
customer_reviews.text: The product was awesome, you feel like your getting the real taste of what coffee should taste like. Unfortunately our glass pot broke about a 1-2 weeks after purchase cause they're quite thin. The filter still works great and we use it everyday! Would recommend if your a coffee lover, just be very careful with the glass, its fragile!
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: A great fast pour-over
customer_reviews.text: It is a good a pour over as you can find. The filter does very well and the carafe is stylish and doubles as a server. The lip is well made and pours cleanly without doubling back and running down the body. The funnel has enough capacity to make a almost espresso strength if you wish or as mild as you wish. Small amount of residual grind in the last cup if you grind fine, but that is to be expected. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dean Nasser

customer_reviews.title: Love the Coffee Gator!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simply coffee maker that wouldn't be wasteful. Also, wanted something where I didn't have to make a ton of coffee just for myself. After doing a search, I stumbled on the Coffee Gator. Purchased it and couldn't be happier. The product is easy to use and easy to wash. Like others have stated, the glass is a bit delicate so be mindful of how it's placed and balanced. Otherwise, I love it and have been using it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Glass breaks easily.  I'd rather buy an alternative.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with it while it lasted, but the glass broke. It was accidentally broken by a cleaning lady while we were away; so, I don't know how hard it was dropped, but what a rip-off! The glass replacement is as much as the price of a new one! Without the glass, the filter is very inconvenient to use. I should have a bought the one that can simply stand on a cup, like this one:
customer_reviews.author: Shenanig

customer_reviews.title: Quick clean cup of full bodied coffee
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. Produced a quick clean cup of full bodied coffee. Cleanup was a bit easier than clean up of a French Press coffee maker. The only reason I didn't give this a 5 star review was because it seems like the glass canister could be fragile. Setting it down on the granite countertop made me nervous. If you want a pour over brewer, you can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cleaver

customer_reviews.title: Great New Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time as promised and packing was great. Really like this new method of making coffee. Very simple to use, just follow instructions, and it makes a great tasting cup of coffee. Also bought their Tea pot with thermometer built in for precise water temperature control which is a game changer for a great cup of coffee. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RC67

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because there is no plastic being heated in the process of your coffee being made. I have looked for similar products and most have a filter with some plastic on it - this one does not. I am so happy with it. It makes more coffee than I assumed it would so it’s a great size too!
customer_reviews.author: JohnathonThomas

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Now!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter on her birthday. She is a coffee "snob" when it comes to brewing a cup of Joe! This set up did not disappoint! Extremely easy to use, the filter did not let one bit off grounds into the cup and cleanup was super easy. Stop using pour overs with a paper filter! This is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Lex D Landers

customer_reviews.title: A necessary tool for a coffee lover.
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee and I love this thing! Having never tried pour over before, I was excited to get it and start experimenting. I used one of my favorite beans, ground them up and started pouring. The result was delicious. All the things I loved about that coffee before were elevated. The taste was cleaner and fresher than a French press or a traditional coffee maker. And the process almost meditative. I will be purchasing more great things from Coffee Gator, for sure. So glad to have this little guy in my arsenal of caffeination gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Rcena Maness

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use and just as described. It is more less figuring out the right amount of coffee to use to get to the taste you want. But everything was exactly as described and a good option for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a single large cup or 2 small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a single large cup or 2 small cups of coffee. If I don't feel like making a whole pot, this is the way to go. The mesh is so fine, not even the finest bits of sediment get through. This results in a perfect product, and an easy cleanup job. Just a 2 second rinse, and it's clean! Just make sure you get one of the small-spout kettles so you can control the pour over the top. Watch some youtube videos, and you'll be making hipster coffee in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Silva

customer_reviews.title: Makes a fine cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: The coffee great gator makes a terrific cup of pour over coffee. It is a good way to provide that lift in the late morning or early afternoon. The coffee is smooth and helps keep energy levels high without the acid taste that comes with other methods. It even allows me to make just enough so I don't waste any of my ground beans. I give it a two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: RusticBK

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprising.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a secondary coffee maker and it just might replace my Bodum. It has no plastic parts, a handle for easy pouring and the basket lets less sediment pass through leaving a smoother cup of coffee. An attractive beaker design adds to the whole. If I have any complaints it would be that it doesn't have a lid, but neither does the bodum.
customer_reviews.author: selket16

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant in Design and makes a quality cup!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge coffee drinker but I do like to have a good cup every now and then. I have a french press which is great however cleaning it tends to be a pain. This helps eliminate that issue with the reusable filter and it doesn't take as much time as expected. The only downside to the Coffee Gator is that, for me and I am sure like most others, the 4 cups listed is really only about 2 cups but after you use it once it is easy to remember to make more and since the coffee is so much better than the easy "cups" it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: DropTopChickenBox

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It's much easier to clean than a machine that has a reservoir you cannot see into to thoroughly clean. Just a note for anyone contemplating getting a pour over, with this one, I recommend grinding your coffee (beans or ground) finer than ground coffee as the taste will be far more splendid!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Superior
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months and am about to start a job that won't allow me to take the time. I bought a drip machine and thought it would be no big deal to switch back. It is a big deal. The same coffee does not taste nearly as good out of a common drip machine. This is the way to go it you want to truly enjoy a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: ++A++'s
customer_reviews.text: Chose this coffee gator pour over brewer for the handle style attached to the flask and the paperless stainless steel filter. Easy to use and clean up a breeze. Love this glass handle !! Highly recommend if you want a small 4 cup volume.
customer_reviews.author: r83c

customer_reviews.title: Grest flavor
customer_reviews.text: The product fine. It makes grest tasting coffee. I was just a little surprised at the size of both pot & filter. It is the perfect size for one person which is all I need. However, I would have to repeat the process multiple times if I were having guests.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: I Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first, only because I thought it would filter through really slow; however, I was pleasantly surprised with this little beast. It filtered through faster than I thought it would. Filters very smooth, and easy to clean. Definitely a must have if you want a small but portable maker and are on a tight budget!
customer_reviews.author: Malory Renee Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Coffee pours through pretty fast, which makes it lighter than I prefer
customer_reviews.text: Coffee pours through pretty fast, which makes it lighter than I prefer. Well made. It has picture measurements of "cups" on it, but in this case 3 "cups" fills my regular mug. Can make coffee for two people total, max. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Entry level, but a good alternative to leading brands....
customer_reviews.text: A decent alternative to more expensive units. Should only be considered, in my opinion of course, as an entry level product to the world of pour over as it is for one, wayyyyyyy more forgiving than pro products.
customer_reviews.author: Pizzo

customer_reviews.title: My best purchase from Prime Day
customer_reviews.text: This little Coffee Gator makes the best tasting cup of coffee I've had in three decades! I'd been eyeing the big ones but hesitant because of size and price. Coffee Gator is perfect for using at work and sitting on my desk afterward. And the clean up is SO easy, it's no hassle to turn around and make a second cup immediately. Plus, it's cool the way it looks like a scientist's beaker. It's been quite a conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Edward Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I was afraid it'd be too fragile, after reading the reviews, but it's fine. I don't know how these people are treating it, but I just treat it like glass and I had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a few cups
customer_reviews.text: I love using this. It works great for two cups of coffee. Usually about all I need. So it's pointless to have a full size drip coffee maker. Not too mention, it's really easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this very flimsy pot.
customer_reviews.text: Glass coffee pot very flimsy after 2 months of being very carefuy it broke. Order a different pot. Ordered the bean envy pot had good reviews let you know I make sounds like a more rugged pot. Ordered and received the bean envy pot; higher quality, rubber bottom, larger so makes for an easier pour over we will see how long this last. Also it seem like I don’t have to handle it with Kidd gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy cup of full-flavored coffee
customer_reviews.text: I've invested in many different products to brew that "perfect cup" of coffee. I've used k-cups, French presses, drip makers, and even an expensive cappuccino machine. This simple coffee maker tops them all. It brews a flavorful, bold cup of coffee with little fuss.
customer_reviews.author: JeffWasHereToo!

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Super simple to use and affords a customizable great tasting cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Shirden

customer_reviews.title: Still need filters with this
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping to reduce my need for paper filter waste but you still have to use them with this device or the water drains too quickly and you get watered down coffee.
customer_reviews.author: ATLLS

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love my Coffee Gator - so much better for the environment than my old Keurig. Makes great coffee and clean up is a breeze. Plus the customer service is excellent! Had a slight issue with the filter and they happily came to the rescue. Learned about the pour over method while visiting a coffee plantation in Costa Rica years ago. So happy I made the switch to Coffee Gator.
customer_reviews.author: Judi C

customer_reviews.title: Slow and fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Glass is extremely thin, but hasn't cracked yet. Very slow to drip though. The filter doesn't hold very much water, so it is time consuming to keep refilling as the coffee very slowly filters through. Carafe doesn't hold enough for two mugs of coffee, unless overfilled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I have long wanted to shift into something more environmentally friendly and sustainable and this is the transition! It’s so far helped with make really good coffee and the setup and clean up is so easy. It’s also really easy to clean by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to get something to make coffee that was small and easy to use that I could leave at her house ...
customer_reviews.text: When I visit my daughter and her family out of state I'm the only coffee drinker in the house. I wanted to get something to make coffee that was small and easy to use that I could leave at her house so I ordered the Coffee Gator and used it for two weeks over the Holidays. It's easy to use and makes great coffee. My wife doesn't drink coffee either so when I got back home I ordered another one and retired the electric coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: B.M.

customer_reviews.title: Love our little Coffee Gator.
customer_reviews.text: Love our Coffee Gator! We had a Jura for about 10 years and my hubby just got tired of the taste. K-cups are great, but very pricey, with a lot of plastic to toss. This little Gator uses a finely ground coffee, just pour boiling water through a few times. Rinses out easily. The glass is very thin and seems fragile....but purchased a second one to have in backup status!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Casado

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great Service when Glass Breaks Off Easily from Hand Washing
customer_reviews.text: Update: Owner contacted me and took care of the problem. What a fair and caring company!!! My previous post was I Nearly almost cut my hand washing it when a big chunk of glass broke off. I always use a baby bottle brush to wash it and always hand washed all parts. I never dropped it. I am shocked after a few months a piece of glass would snap off. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: CVK

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on how many scoops of coffee to water was difficult to understand in the instructions because it used oz instead of tablespoons. I don't weight my coffee. But once I googled it and played around, I was able to findy recipe for perfect coffee. Super easy to clean, but my hand doesn't quite fit to get to the bottom. The concept of a drip coffee is great! And it doesn't give that plastic aftertaste that the Keurig does. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Besade

customer_reviews.title: Coffee junkie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our RV. The traditional maker used too much power. I'm using it at home now because the coffee tastes so much better with the pour over. It's great I would recommend it. What is needed is a top for the carafe to keep the coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: grandma emily

customer_reviews.title: Extremely convenient , great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for work due to Keurig fatigue. I only drink about 1-2 cups at work, and this seemed perfect. Did some research for pour over vs french press, opted for this since the idea of replacing a paper filter each use seemed wasteful. All this comes with is the decantur and the stainless steel filter. Both super easy to use and clean. All you need is hot water and grounded coffee. Superb.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin L Sherman

customer_reviews.title: An awesome alternative to Chemex
customer_reviews.text: An awesome alternative to Chemex. We took a class on pour over coffee and invested in this accessory. Just a note it's more important to weigh your beans and realize the Coffee Gator is a 4 oz. cup as opposed to the 5oz. cup Chemex. Still experimenting with this technique, so far I've been happier with this method; it's superior to Keurig or drip.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: As good as the rave reviews say!
customer_reviews.text: Was always interested in pour over and finally researched pour over systems. Coffee gator consistently came up on top. Bought it and haven’t looked back - easy, stylish and delish!
customer_reviews.author: DebsD

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pour over I have used and I love it! My boyfriend got it for me for Christmas and I have been using it whenever I get a chance. I love the flavor of the coffee compared to a drip machine! The glass seems like it's very fragile but it has held up this far, I don't expect it to break anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Roads

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely small however for a single person wanting A single cup of coffee or two it is ideal
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty decent for a single person,,, however make sure to wash at least several times with soapy water and rinse well before first initial use as you may encounter a strong metallic taste,,, washing several times should help with this,,,,4/22/18 update glass is very thin will break with the greatest of ease....
customer_reviews.author: William Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Make the switch- you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been considering making the move to a pour-over for a while, and I’m so glad I finally did. The Coffee Gator filter is amazing— and I love that there’s no paper involved. The carafe is easy to use and pour. The coffee flavor is really rich and delightful, and it doesn’t take that long to brew. Customer service has been great, too!
customer_reviews.author: T. Nicole Cirone

product_meta.title: Pour Over Coffee Maker - Great Coffee Made Simple - 3 Cup Hand Drip Coffee Maker With Stainless Steel Filter - No Paper Filters Needed - By Coffee Gator
feature_bullets: More smiles per cup. Baristas agree, pour over brewing unlocks the full potential of coffee. This drip kit is the easiest way to get there. Prepare your taste buds for a flavor fiesta that will leave you grinning like a possum eating a sweet potato

Get more from your beans. Coffee travels long and far and has the capacity to make you extremely happy. This 14 oz pour over coffee dripper with 100% BPA-free carafe means maximum flavor and minimal effort

Save time, hassle and the planet. Single-use filters are history. They cost money, strip flavor, create waste and damage the environment. This laser-cut stainless steel mesh filter ensures flavor ends up on your lips - not in the trash
Everything you want - nothing you don’t. Forget all those nasty dregs getting into your brew. Prepare your senses for a fragrant, naturally sweeter, coffee house-standard brew in your own home

Why risk disappointment? Unlike the competition, we never compromise on quality or service. Our feedback shows we know coffee - our 100% satisfaction promise proves we care about your personal happiness. Choose Gator today for dream coffee tomorrow

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,090 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
